38778694.review: A very straightforward and enjoyable turn-based dungeon crawler. Great game, I put a ton of time into the old flash version and I'm glad to have it again on Steam.

38765688.review: its fun, kept me entertained for a while.

38615729.review:
I first played this game when deployed to Iraq in 2008 off one of our "Morale' folders on our network. I didnt think it was an actual legit game lol, I thought it was just some free demo the govt got for the deployed troops. I had a ton of fun with it and it scratched my video game itch while deployed.
Fast forward 8ish years and i randomly stumbled upon it in the steam store and thought "Holy crap THIS game?! No way!" So of course i threw $5 at it and play the hell out of it on and off. Awesomely simplistic dungeon crawler. Great enemy variety, forces you to balance your team and equipment. Great game especially for the price, nothing epic but if you are looking for turnbased rpg you can fire up for 20-30min before dinner/bed without having to devote 3 hrs to get invested/pay attention to a story or to click away at while watching your tv show this is a great pick up.

38558364.review:
One of my absolute favorite flash games from years ago, truly glad that the creator put it on steam.
The gameplay is very simple at a glance, just a point and click style to move around and enter combat. However once you start playing you quickly realize that you can't have every character on your team at the same time. The game holds a depth to it that you'll want to play it multiple times and indeed even after 10 or 20 play throughs you'll still be trying out new things, new character builds and team builds.

37785415.review:
年轻的时候玩过很长一段时间的Flash版本，现在来补票。
游戏本身并没有出奇之处，地牢探索、小队组合、多样技能、词缀装备、回合战斗，都是一些非常经典也滥大街的游戏元素。但是百玩不厌，非常奇妙。相比最近玩过的一款相似的游戏《Dungeon Rushers》，同样是多种经典游戏元素的组合，后者很快就让人感到了一种重复劳作的痛苦感。
就我个人而言，根结在两点，随机性和平衡度。
随机性可以说是roguelike类游戏的精髓，但并非有随机性就一定是roguelike类游戏。玩家喜新厌旧的情况是非常普遍的，当一款游戏无法再带给玩家新的体验时，很可能就是被抛弃的时候。而随机性可以让一款10M的游戏，玩出1000M的内涵来，让玩家永远体会到不一样的游戏。
如果说随机性是游戏的外表，那平衡度就是游戏的内涵。平衡度是什么？很难说清楚。付出和收获之间的平衡？挫败感和成就感之间的平衡？游戏进度和难度提升之间的平衡？而对于游戏设计者而言，就是数据，很可能一次两次的修改无法把握好平衡，但是根据玩家的反馈，不断去揣摩，不断去平衡，这才是重要。

36532663.review: This game is just as great as it was for free on kongregate, %100 worth playing for hours on end.

36150038.review:
Monsters' Den: Book of Dread to bardzo udany Rouge-Like Dungeon Crawler, który - za darmo dostępny na stronach pokroju Kongregate - został również wydany na steam. I jest to na tyle dobra gra, że taka cebula jak ja zdecydowała się za nią zapłacić.

Recenzja skrócona:
+ 7 różnych klas, z różnymi umiejętnościami
+ 2 kampanie, z losowo generowanymi lochami + tryb nieskończonej walki
+ Dobrze zrealizowana, turowa walka
+ Bardzo dobra warstwa muzyczna

- Powtarzalność dźwięków
- Powtarzalność lochów

Ocena 7/10

Zdecydowanie, MD:BoD to jedna z najlepszych gier we flashu, w które grałem, swego czasu pożarła mi dziesiątki godzin z życia - no regrets tho.
Nie należy od niej oczekiwać wodotrysków graficznych, czy miodnej fabuły, ale sam gameplay jest świetny, i wzbudza syndrom "jeszcze jednego lochu". Dzięki prostemu, nieskomplikowanemu podziałowi na "piętra" jest to gra zarówno na dłuższe sesje, jak i na 5 minutek. Zdecydowanie polecam, produkcja na prawdę warta swojej ceny.

35429795.review:
Interesting game. Not something I'm used to, but it is fun in short bursts. You can create your party, and you adventure through a 2-D map. You can find chests, orbs that revitalize you, and encounters. Encounters take place in a card style format.

While I am unsure, it does seem to be sort-of a flash game port. That said it is fun. And if you get it on discount, even better.

34703613.review:
[h1]I'm not sure if the developer could notice this review[/h1]

[h1]Reeeeeally hope this game can be released on the mobile platform!!!![/h1]

[b]cause this game is sooooooo fun![/b]


一款刷刷刷根本停不下来的小游戏

入坑八年惟一一个全价购买的游戏.

Flash版本的游戏我应该刷了500+小时

无意间发现steam居然有remaster版本

是一款非常适合上班时间摸鱼的游戏

34471387.review: The game is free to play online on Kongregate but I bought it to support the designer and to save progress (without downloading cookies). A great game.

34418161.review:
Pour un jeu que l'on peut trouver gratuitement sur internet en flash, je pense que les dévellopeurs auraient pu le laisser gratuit sur steam, MAIS: Offrir une extension d'inventaire pour ceux qui auraient payé, et/ou une étoile d'acces à l'Emporium

Cela reste pour moi un excellent jeu de tour par tour exploration de donjon.
L'idée que l'on puisse personnaliser l'image des heros est juste excellente. meme si c'est pas grand choses pour d'autre, je trouve que c'est pour ma part un très grand +

EDIT: J'ai constaté que le bouton destroy item a été remplacé par SELL item, laissez tomber l'extension d'inventaire et privilégiez l'étoile d'Emporium

34017411.review: 初中陆陆续续玩了三四年，几百个小时估计有的。耐玩，装备系统大，套路多样。消磨时间的好游戏。

33392902.review: A good deal for a couple hours of dungeon-crawling, loot hoarding, and turn-based combat with some depth to it. Based on the Flash game, but now with fullscreen. Well worth the $5, though the procedurally generated floors can get repetitive-- it's better as something to dip into every now and then.

32653356.review: 플래시게임으로 많이했었는데 스팀게임에 있었네요 시간때우기도 좋구 왠만한 폰겜보다 재밌어요 해보세요

32329193.review:
Played it back in the times on flashgame sites like Kongerate & Amorgames.

Still good and still as playable as before. Nothing new. dungeoncrawling in procedural generated environments with several types of themes enemies and unique tactics and skills for each class.

Still enjoyable!

32147791.review: Wow!! Really enjoying this game! Super addictive! Just finished the first of three campaigns! Love this game!

31517067.review: This is another game I first discovered as a browser game on Notdoppler.  It's an incredibly fun game.  You create a party of up to 4 heroes and enter a dungeon.  Once you beat the "final" boss (at level 10) you can then enter an endless dungeon mode, which is exactly what it sounds like: a neverending dungeon generator.  "But MetalTreads, if it's a browser game, why wouldn't I just go play it for free there?" you ask.  Weeeeell, for one this version is saved to steam, not browser history so you can never lose progress unless you delete it. As well, you can access it from any computer that has steam. For two, you can use custom portraits for your heroes.  For three, full screen + good quality graphics = what more do I need to say?  For four, it's only $4.99 so even if you don't like it you're not down that much.  I love it and highly recommend it to anyone who likes WoW-ish type stuff.

31369566.review: I played this game on Newgrounds all the time when I was in middle school. When I found out the game was remastered on Steam, I was jumping up and down like a little girl who just got her first American Girl doll.

30970599.review:
I absolutely love this game. Back in highschool when this was a web browser game, I would sign up for computer classes just to play this game secretly in a corner.

What I love most about the remastered version of the game is that not a single thing changed. There is so much loot to be had, so many boss fights, and bad ass legendary monsters to hunt. To my knowledge, the game has no end. You can beat the campaign, but it lets you keep playing anyway for the sake of things. 

It's simple enough to play casually, but challenging enough to make you think. The most fun part is its Diablo 2 skill tree mechanics that you try some really unique parties. 

Truth be told and all things considered, I do think this game shot itself in the foot of offering the price at $5. It was a free web browser game back in the day. This game is an easy buy for any dungeon crawl or RPG fan at a less price.

Seriously, this should be considered a classic in any dungeon crawl gamer's repitoire.

30905283.review:
玩了半年之后，忘记了它的名字。
找了七年。
终于能补上票了。这个游戏是我有史以来玩过最好的队伍策略游戏之一，比龙腾世纪更喜欢。

30840546.review: I like many others played this game online first, and didnt mind dropping the money, because i knew i had already honestly gotten that much out of it in its free to play days (is it free to play if the game didnt sell you anything? I digress) and the game would be worth it in its entirety anyways. For soemone who just wants to relax with an arpg and doesnt want a sprawling epic tale at that moment i highly reccomend. Deep enough to be interesting, simple enough for a quick break. I reccomend.

30460490.review: Love this game. Played it for many, many years and it is still fun to run through it here and there as there is a lot of replay ability. If you like RPG, strategy games, fantasy medieval style. This one is for you.

30131256.review: Awesome game, very nostalgic. I remember playing this as a kid, and it still does not disappoint to this day. I have over 30 hours on steam already, and is my go-to time killer. Simple, yet addicting as hell.

30048566.review:
Considering the cost, you are definitely getting your money's worth.

It's a pretty enjoyable dungeon crawler that let you create a team and delve as far down into the dungeon that you can. There's something of a plot somewhere, but you're playing the game for the mechanics and combat over the fluff. 

The custom portraits are an arguably small feature but also allows you to really customize the characters to make a "dream" party. My last game, I ran with Godzilla, Joan of Arc, Robot Maria, and Stephen Toast.

If you have a rouge-like or dungeon-delving itch, this game can scratch. If you are looking for anything more robust or lore heavy: do yourself a favour and look elsewhere.

29917955.review: Tolles RPG. Großartig zum Zwischendurchspielen. Mir gefällt besonders die große Itemvielfalt.

29542542.review: If you've ever played a dungeon crawler before, you've already played this.  It's nothing special, but I appreciate the simplicity of it and the combat is enjoyable, plus I'm always a sucker for the classic Western CRPG style.  The roguelike elements will certainly lend itself well to repeated playthroughs.  Ultimately, it's just a relaxing game that I'll certainly sink many hours into.  If you're a dungeon junkie you can't go wrong at 5 bucks.  Looking forward to achievements and more games from this developer.

29296450.review:
Arguably the best roguelike dungeon-crawler there is.

是九年情怀，是踢门史诗，是屎王从大学起玩过最棒的小队地城探险类游戏。
组建勇者小队，深入阴险地城，战翻凶恶怪物，收获强大神器……

更有最新续作《Godfall》于本月晚些时候发售，我超兴奋的！

29278412.review: This has killed my days while it was on kongregate, armor games etc. I buy it because it reminds me my old flash game times.

29241263.review:
Highly classic and Highly true to dungeons and dragons.

-Pros* The Best of dungeons and dragons has to offer is here with only a indepth single player experiance.

-Cons* Nothing to deny here while being a classic of perfection!

29050526.review: ITS SO MUCH BETTER! Thankyou so much for remastering that game!

28950369.review: Genuinely love this game, played it so many times online for free and was more than happy to spend £3 to get it on steam, especially considering that I usually had to start the game again every time I cleared my cache, and now I can save my progress/play multiple campaigns

28792195.review: Unfortunatily, this game is not as good as the flash games.  Graphics are worse, the gameplay is worse, the customization is worse.  So free is better

28353339.review: Played this a lot back when it was online. Loved it. Really good character skills and unique items. The leveling system (no experience - you just gain a level for each level of the dungeon) is fresh too. Not aware of any other game that does it with experience points.

26668156.review:
Il y a des jeux qui passent totalement inaperçus par manque de moyens, ou parce que ce n’est pas la bonne période ou encore parce que le support sur lequel ils ont été créés n’est pas l’apanage des joueurs ciblés. Aujourd’hui, je vais vous parler d’un jeu, ou plutôt d’une licence, dont on entend peu parler et qui d’après son créateur a abouti à plus de 30 millions de parties. Une série de jeux flash qui est passée trop souvent à la trappe. Pourtant l’unique développeur est connu pour avoir travaillé sur un spin off d’une célèbre licence que les rôlistes aiment. Et vous auriez tort de passer à côté de cette série de dungeon crawler qui évolue depuis sa création et qui doit voir arriver prochainement sur Steam un nouvel épisode. Vous avez deviné de quoi je parle ? J’ai nommé la série des Monsters’ Den. Et si on testait l’épisode sorti en 2016 : Monsters’ Den : Book of Dread ? 


La suite ici : http://www.dagonslair.com/tests-de-jeux/solo/2008/monsters-den-book-of-dread/

26345667.review: I really enjoy playing this game! Great way to have fun and past time!

25850236.review: Woah, time goes fast, eight fucking years ago! And still as a amazing. Endless hours of gameplay.

25420608.review:
This game has already given me hours and hours of fun and distraction when it was browser-based. I returned to it now, 8 years later, and it's still a great dungeon crawl, and lots of fun. I especially love to try different combination of characters, to see how far it takes me. My favorite combo remains: Warriror, Ranger, Rogue and Cleric.

Can't wait for Godfall!

24675293.review: C'est connu ce jeu, à l'origine gratuit, sur le net, et je l'ai toujours apprécié. Un mélange d'exploration de donjons, avec des combats et des trésors à trouver sur votre route. Mais comme il est encore possible de le trouvé gratuitement, avec quelques options en moins, je le recommanderais uniquement en solde.

24591874.review:
This isn't a bad roguelike dungeon stomper by any stretch, but it's definitely showing its age, and could certainly have used some polish when transferring it from its free-to-play origins (check out Kongregate, for example) to its latest Steam incarnation.

The maps are a bit drab - which, when you consider that's what you spend your whole game looking at, is not brilliant.  The inventory system is pretty awful - but I do really like the combat, even if it can be a bit tough and prone to the vaguaries of the RNG gods at times.

I'd recommend it, but I'd also recommend waiting until it's on special.

24509732.review:
This game is fun and very well designed.  I'm not very leet and the game has difficulty settings that can give me a challenge without making me rage quit.

I've tried about 3 games like this before and this one is the best I've played by far.  If you're looking for a dungeon crawl rogue-like (optional), that's friendly on the learning curve, yet still challenging, and fun.   This is a good investment of your gaming dollars.

10/10 will continue to play this.  :)

24509029.review: LOVE THIS GAME! CANT WAIT FOR GODFALL!

24488724.review:
***FULL DISCLOSURE - I receved this for free for backing Monsters' Den: Godfall***

I have loved this game since I first discovered it as a flash game.

It's simple, chalenging, and fun.

You create a party of 4 adventureres and delv into a dungeon, fight monsters of varying types, and then get loot to make your party better at killing monsters.

It's not much more than that, however, there are dozens of combinations of classes and skills so you can play however you want to.

You can even uplod images as custom portraits for your party members.

$4.99 is a fair price, IMO, for a fun desktop dungeon crawler such as this.

Holding out hope that Godfall will be AMAZING!

24472200.review: OMG Great classic RPG here, fully recommend, music and sound effects are great. A bit basic, but heaps of fun. (If you have any neighbors, friends family or flatmates fighting, recommend pumping your sound on your speakers, can drown them out with drama, healing and slashing effects. 8.5 out of 10

24455793.review: KILL<KILL<KILL<KILL, and more killing. this is just plain mindless fun!

24452189.review: Exactly what I was expecting. It is a remastered version of the old flash game and plays exactly the same. I thoroughly enjoyed it and $4.00 is a fair price to support the devs.

24451989.review:
Never heard of this game before, so never played the free version.  I don't consider $4.50 on sale alot for a game, and developers after all need to eat.  Having said that, this is a great game.  It reminds me quite a bit of Might and Magic 6-8 without the "pretty" graphics.  Will probably be playing this one for a long time to come.  Will probably try Godfall when it comes out as well.

9 / 10.

24445463.review: It might be an old flash game that's been remade but it's quite amusing. I'm enjoying it although it can be hard at first to get the hang of things.

24445197.review:
I played this game on Kongregate many years ago, so most of my time with it is on there. 
I really do wish there was a side-ways thumb on Steam, because I can't say that I 100% recommend this game. The reason I do, however, is that Monsters' Den is a pretty chill and enjoyable game. It's not super flashy or in depth or anything. It's very much just a point and click turn based strategy RPG. If you're going into this expecting Baldurs Gate level game design (Or whatever good RPG you've played recently) you're going to be very disappointed. It's just a fantastic time waster. Lots of loot. Infinite dungeon crawling. Bosses that can actually be challenging. Stuff like that.

The reason I would have given this game a thumbs down is that there's very little in terms of upgrades from their flash version on other websites. Aside from increased resolution support, I don't really see anything different or real worth while that I would spend over $5 on. 

That being said, this game is only 5 bucks, and what did exist on other websites was a really enjoyable experience. I recommend giving it a try, purely because it's so cheap and can be pretty addicting if you're into games that aren't demanding of your time and energy.

24434051.review:
I was just thinking about how I wanted to play this game, since I played it a long time ago on a flash game site, and here it was, on Steam the entire time! Just waiting for me on sale (barely) for a little over 4 bucks!
What's the VERY first thing I do? Create my team of...
The legendary warrior: Gunny R. Lee Ermey
Healer/team motivator: Shia LaBeouf
Ranger: Myself
And of course our rouge: the awe inspiring California Senator Kevin De Leon, utilizing the power of the ghost gun to sneak behind enemy lines and hit them where it hurts!

24433992.review: This game is so nostalgic for me, I remeber coming home everyday and relaxing with this game and it was just so much fun, and still is. I definitely recommend getting this game if you even in the littlist, enjoy dungeon crawling games, especially since this games' replayable makes this game much more than worth what it costs.

24430210.review:
Fun for $5.00

Check it out, my opinion means nothing but I have spent more money on less fun games, no names mentioned.

24429949.review: For 5 bucks is a fun little dungeon crawl.  Each level gives you the opportunity to raise stats and choose a skill.  New more difficult creatures as you go down the rabbit hole.  The ability to sell your unwanted gear without going to the vendor is a great addition to the game vs. the free version.  I played the game all the time on Kongregate and happily support the dev and their continued contribution to the Monster's Den games.  Can't wait for the next one.

24420464.review:
Book of Dread has always been my favorite in the Monster's Den series. So glad that the remastered version was made available to the general public instead of being a Kickstarter only reward. Keep up the good work, can't wait for Godfall!

You can find the full game for free on a number of different websites. I personally was happy to spend the $5 to support the developer and play in full screen.

24420188.review: This game is pretty much identical to the website version, there are very few changes like the menu screen.  Some of the text hasn't even been changed like with difficulty selection that still proposes one of the game modes is "new".  Overall I would recommend this game if the images interest you even though it is bare bones, however it is quite an enjoyable experience.  I am not sure it is worth the $5 price point considering you can still find practically the full game online for free though.
